description: This playbook helps us ensure each employee's variable compensation plan is prepared correctly each and every time.
message_on_join: This is an optional markdown message that can be sent to every new channel member for each playbook run.
reminder_message_template: This is a markdown template for the recurring status update.
retrospective_template: This is a markdown template for the retrospective after finishing the run.
